info.name: Luvwish E-Commerce API
info.description: Complete API collection for Luvwish E-Commerce platform with COD/Online payments, notifications, and simplified variations

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Cotton T-Shirt",
  "subCategoryId": "<subcategory-id>",
  "discountedPrice": 19.99,
  "actualPrice": 24.99,
  "stockCount": 100,
  "description": "Comfortable cotton t-shirt",
  "isStock": true,
  "images": [
    {
      "url": "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
      "altText": "Product image",
      "isMain": true,
      "sortOrder": 0
    }
  ]
}
